entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet user-jwts create` throws exception in rc.1 builds #43726
  • NavigationLock with ConfirmExternalNavigations doesn't show confirm dialog when changing address bar after initial app load #43725
  • NavigationLock with ConfirmExternalNavigation throws exception when prerendering #43724
  • Incoming connections can stop HTTP/3 accept loop #43723
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #43720
  • Restore CI validation that blazor.server/webview.js are up-to-date #43715
  • Validation Summary Tag Helper renders style attribute which conflicts with Content Security Policy (CSP) #43714
  • Allow sections to be defined inside Views and Partial Views and let them have Models #43713
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #43712
  • Blazor custom elements shouldn't require explicit script reference to BlazorCustomElements.js #43710
  • Minimal api allows to describe response types #43708
  • API response details are not shown in swagger when using WithOpenApi() method with OpenApiOperation copy constructor #43707
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Quarantine Listen_Http3AndSocketsCoexistOnSameEndpoint_AltSvcEnabled_Upgrade #42967
    7.0-rc2
  • Deploy to Azure steps #43567
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #43684
  • Perf improvement: mvc #43698
  • [Blazor] the `pointerenter` and `pointerleave` events not getting fired #43129
    7.0-rc2
  • Quarantine WebHostTests.UseUrls_HelloWorld_ClientSuccess #38954
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ClientCertificate_Required_NotSent_AcceptedViaCallback #42389
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ClientCertificate_Allow_NotAvailable_Optional #42388
    Test failures
  • EndpointBuilder.ApplicationServices should use `init` instead of `set` #43544
    7.0-rc2
  • Update Endpoint metadata providers to include EndpointBuilder param #43125
    7.0-rc2
  • Expose entire EndpointBuilder to filter factories #43000
    7.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Nightly Installer Link ++ `dotnet8` nuget feed #43722
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Error Logging for the Blazor DebugProxyLauncher #43721
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-debugging, 7.0-rc2
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime
  • Unquarantine ClientAbortingConnectionImmediatelyIsNotLoggedHigherThanDebug #43717
    area-runtime
  • Avoid client result invocation ID collisions #43716
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix summary formatting #43711
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Update gRPC and Protobuf dependencies #43709
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc

Merged

  • [7.0] Handle Transfer-Encoding edge cases #43669
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Cleanup retry list #43718
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • [release/7.0] Hot reload: Acknowledge Blazor component parameter removal #43418
    area-blazor, feature-hot-reload
  • Add pointerenter/leave to nonBubblingEvents #43542
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] QUIC: Don't complete writes on abort #43630
    area-runtime
  • Unquarantine WebHostTests.UseUrls_HelloWorld_ClientSuccess #43535
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • Unquarantine ClientCertificate_Required_NotSent_AcceptedViaCallback #43536
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1-publicPoolNames' => 'release/7.0' #43674
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Unquarantine ClientCertificate_Allow_NotAvailable_Optional #43537
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • [release/7.0] Add and use RDF.InferMetadata and update new PopulateMetadata API #43543
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `1edf19d` to `ec91da8` #43692
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Updated

  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Unskip tests now that Runtime bug is fixed #43667
    area-commandlinetools
  • Update SpaProxy.cs #43663
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • Skip output caching for keys with delimiters #43553
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching, 7.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1982628 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43647
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [7.0-rc2] Allow spaces between the url and http version #43704 #43706
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [6.0] Allow spaces between the url and http version #43704
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [SignalR] Fix bug when combining streaming and client results #43552
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc2
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [6.0] Handle Transfer-Encoding edge cases #43671
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.10
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dd7a9d2` to `9080381` #43690
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dd7a9d2` to `9080381` #43689
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Serialize output caching entries to binary #43672
    area-runtime
  • Update dotnet-getdocument to support minimal APIs #43701
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks
